materials.name: Crystals functionalized with sodium resorufin and sodium fluorescein

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Selective sieving effects demonstrated with a series of eight methanol solutions with differently-sized dyes. The smallest channel is only accessible to the dyes of group I, whereas the larger channel is accessible to both small and large dyes (groups I and II).

materials.name: Crystals functionalized with sodium fluorescein (SF) followed by sodium resorufin (SR)

synthesis_conditions.observations: Dichroic under polarized light, showing purple or yellow depending on the angle of the incident light.

materials.name: Crystals functionalized with sodium fluorescein (SF) and varying amounts of sodium resorufin (SR)

sequence: Then loaded with varying amounts of sodium resorufin
synthesis_conditions.observations: Demonstrated Förster resonance energy transfer (FRET) between the sodium salts of fluorescein (SF) and resorufin (SR) in the host crystals.
